alert.note: Alert for Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washburn and northwestern Sawyer Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayward, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayward, Round Lake, Seeley, Little Round Lake, Northwoods Beach, Totagatic Flowage, Stanberry, Grindstone Lake, Nelson Lake, Lac Courte Oreilles, Chief Lake, and Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
